CustomField.inlineHelpText: Opportunities must be associated with New (Prospect) or Current (Customer) accounts. Customer accounts have a bill-to number; if needed, create a new Prospect account from the Accounts tab.

lookupFilter.infoMessage: Opportunities must be associated with New (Prospect) or Current (Customer) accounts. Customer accounts have a bill-to number; if needed, create a new Prospect account from the Accounts tab.
